data.route_analysis: Guatemala has well-connected roads, with major routes leading to key cities and natural attractions. Public transport includes buses and shuttles.
data.seasonal_patterns: The optimal months to visit Guatemala are from November to April, avoiding the rainy season (May to October).
data.climate: The climate is tropical; expect warm temperatures during the day (20-30°C) and cooler nights, especially in highland areas. Rain is common in the wet season.
data.culture: Guatemala is rich in Mayan history, with vibrant traditions, colorful festivals, and local markets. Highlights include Semana Santa (Holy Week) and Día de los Muertos (Day of the Dead).
data.attractions: Key places to visit include Antigua, Lake Atitlan, Tikal National Park, and Semuc Champey.
